metadata.title: Wednesday, 21st September, 2022
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to procure media equipment for the Zambia News and Information Services in Gwembe District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what type of equipment will be procured; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Finance and National Planning
parts: (a) why the Bank of Zambia allows commercial banks to load small Kwacha bills into Automated Teller Machines, thereby making withdrawing large amounts costly due to the many withdrawal charges;
(b) whether there are any plans to stop the practice;
(c) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to upgrade the Chiundaponde road in Mfuwe Parliamentary Constituency, to bituminous standard;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) what the estimated cost of the project is.
(a) when the communication towers which were constructed at the following locations in Chitambo Parliamentary Constituency will be operationalised:
(i) Mwimbula; (ii) Chitambo Mission Hospital; (iii) Mulaushi Hills; and (iv) Mukando Secondary School; and

(b) what the cause of the delay in operationalising the towers is. ORDER OF THE DAY 1. Thanks – His Excellency the President’s Address - Motion (13th September) - Resumption of Debate: (Mr Kambita, MP). ____________________________
